parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the organization under which the user exists.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The identifier for the user to be described. The identifier can be the UserId, Username, or email. The following identity formats are available: User ID: 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 or S-1-1-12-1234567890-123456789-123456789-1234 Email address: user@domain.tld User name: user.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the described user.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name for the user.

nested_items.name: Email
nested_items.description: The email of the user.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the user.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of a user: enabled (registered to WorkMail) or disabled (deregistered or never registered to WorkMail).

nested_items.name: UserRole
nested_items.description: In certain cases, other entities are modeled as users. If interoperability is enabled, resources are imported into WorkMail as users. Because different WorkMail organizations rely on different directory types, administrators can distinguish between an unregistered user (account is disabled and has a user role) and the directory administrators. The values are USER, RESOURCE, SYSTEM_USER, and REMOTE_USER.

nested_items.name: EnabledDate
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the user was enabled for WorkMailusage, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: DisabledDate
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the user was disabled for WorkMail usage, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: MailboxProvisionedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the mailbox was created for the user.

nested_items.name: MailboxDeprovisionedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the mailbox was removed for the user.

nested_items.name: FirstName
nested_items.description: First name of the user.

nested_items.name: LastName
nested_items.description: Last name of the user.

nested_items.name: HiddenFromGlobalAddressList
nested_items.description: If enabled, the user is hidden from the global address list.

nested_items.name: Initials
nested_items.description: Initials of the user.

nested_items.name: Telephone
nested_items.description: User's contact number.

nested_items.name: Street
nested_items.description: Street where the user is located.

nested_items.name: JobTitle
nested_items.description: Job title of the user.

nested_items.name: City
nested_items.description: City where the user is located.

nested_items.name: Company
nested_items.description: Company of the user.

nested_items.name: ZipCode
nested_items.description: Zip code of the user.

nested_items.name: Department
nested_items.description: Department of the user.

nested_items.name: Country
nested_items.description: Country where the user is located.

nested_items.name: Office
nested_items.description: Office where the user is located.

nested_items.name: IdentityProviderUserId
nested_items.description: User ID from the IAM Identity Center. If this parameter is empty it will be updated automatically when the user logs in for the first time to the mailbox associated with WorkMail.

nested_items.name: IdentityProviderIdentityStoreId
nested_items.description: Identity Store ID from the IAM Identity Center. If this parameter is empty it will be updated automatically when the user logs in for the first time to the mailbox associated with WorkMail.
